review_data.title: Feine drinks
review_data.content: Das Barflyz ist ein toller Ort für after work drinks. Schneller service, feine drinks, faire Preise. Gerne wieder!

review_data.title: nice cosy place for a drink away from the center

review_data.title: Good for quick drinks.

review_data.title: Beste Bar in Zürich

review_data.title: Best cocktails experience!
review_data.content: I went already few times and i'm always really impressed by the level of bartenders. Great cocktails made with style and passion. Nice atmosphere and easy prices. Fingerfoods are not bad as well.Definitely the best cocktail bar in Zürich.

review_data.title: One of the better bars in Zurich
review_data.content: Highly recommendable place with a huge offering of drinks and beers at a reasonable price (for Zurich, that is). Very friendly staff and a nice and relaxed atmosphere. Much better than most of the fancy places in that area!
